title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Sep 2 2022
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Sep 2 2022
description:
Clay breaks down Biden's "soul of the nation" speech last night, naming MAGA Republicans as enemies to democracy. Gov. Greg Abbott (R-TX) talks about the border and how the state's migrant busing program is going. Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker (R) joins Clay to break down the state of the race. Joe Weasel, director and producer of “Fight for Football -- the fight to save the 2020 season” talks about his documentary.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
